short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop products across multitude of websites, add them to a single cart.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your online shopping experience with IdealCart! Shop products across a multitude of websites, and add them to a single cart.

We often tend to shop for products from different websites and save them on the respective websites. With that, it becomes difficult to refer to all the products you've added to your cart or Wishlist. Save time by adding products to a universal shopping cart and adding short notes to each product for future reference, with IdealCart. 


Key Features: 

- When a product is added to the cart, its corresponding image and name are saved into your cart. This improves visibility and navigation between products in your shopping cart. 

- You can add short notes to each product for future reference. For example, if you added a Skate shoe with a 50% discount offer that lasts a month, you can easily add a short editable note to this product so you can refer to it. 

- You can easily sort your products in any order you desire. That way the products are in an organised fashion.

- You can also delete the products from the shopping cart.

- More features to come soon!

For new feature announcements or updates, you can find them on my Twitter handle: https://twitter.com/mano__08
